conversations.content: You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How do I start the enrollment process after being admitted to UTN?

After accepting your study offer on UTNexus, use the "Supplement Data" button to upload required documents and download the enrollment application. Sign and mail it with certified copies of your degree certificates.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Where should I send my enrollment documents?
Send them to: University of Technology Nuremberg UTN School of StaRs – SDA, Dr.-Luise-Herzberg-Straße 4, 90461 Nuremberg.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Hey, when do I need to pay the semester fee?
The semester fee must be paid before submitting your enrollment application. Contact Team Student Services (stars@utn.de) for payment details after accepting your study place.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
How much is the semester fee for Winter 2025/26?
The fee is [amount not specified in text]. Keep proof of payment for your records.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is health insurance mandatory for enrollment?
Yes, all students must have German health insurance. Enrollment cannot proceed without proof of coverage.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
I have private health insurance from my home country. What should I do?
You must still apply for a transfer of your insurance status with a German statutory health insurer by submitting your private insurance proof.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What if my foreign health insurance isn’t accepted?
You’ll need to get insured by a German statutory health insurance company in that case.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I use my European Health Insurance Card (EHIC) for enrollment?

Yes, present your EHIC or its provisional replacement (PEB) to a German statutory insurer to initiate the status transfer to UTN.

How do I know if my enrollment documents were received?
The text doesn’t specify tracking, but you can contact Team Student Services (stars@utn.de) for confirmation.

(Follow-up) What’s the email for the Student Services team again?
Reach them at stars@utn.de for enrollment or payment queries.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Do I need to certify my degree certificates for enrollment?
Yes, submit certified copies of your degree certificates with the signed enrollment application.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What happens if my health insurance confirmation arrives after I submit my enrollment application?
Applications will be processed only once UTN receives the insurance confirmation from your provider.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Can I enroll without accepting the study offer on UTNexus first?
No, you must accept the offer via UTNexus to unlock the enrollment process.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Is there a deadline to pay the semester fee?
The text states the fee must be paid before submitting your enrollment application but doesn’t specify a fixed deadline.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
What if I miss the semester fee payment?
Your enrollment application won’t be processed until UTN receives the payment proof.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Are there any exceptions to the health insurance rule?
No exceptions—all students must have German health insurance, whether statutory, private (with transfer), or EHIC-based.

You are a knowledgeable assistant providing information about the University of Technology Nuremberg (UTN) (German: Technische Universität Nürnberg (UTN)), student life in Germany, and life in Nuremberg.
Who should I contact if my health insurance transfer is delayed?
Work directly with your chosen statutory health insurer, as they handle the status transfer to UTN.

The text specifies submitting signed documents by mail with certified copies, so email isn’t mentioned as an option.
